pr_title: Add HttpStatus.isSuccess() and other boolean getters

timeline.message:
Add HttpStatus.isSuccess line #2434

This changeset added shortcut methods to HttpStatus class

timeline.bodyText: As I mentioned in the issue I don't find a lot of use in specifying client vs server, or convenience for information, which is so rare. But this is non-blocking and happy with what others think
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: I think it's OK to have all of is{Error,ServerError,ClientError}.
replies.author: trustin
ikhoon

replies.bodyText: Thank you for suggestion @ikhoon but being more specific would be better. I prefer to keep as is.
replies.author: mercanil

replies.bodyText: I'd prefer to have isError() for convenience. 🙏
replies.author: trustin

replies.bodyText: added isError() method. Thanks for advice.
replies.author: mercanil

timeline.bodyText:
Could you use multiple line comments?
/**
 * Returns whether ...
 */
timeline.author: ikhoon
trustin

timeline.bodyText:
This may be more efficient:
return HttpStatusClass.INFORMATIONAL.contains(code);
timeline.author: trustin

timeline.bodyText:
Could also add the following to ensure off-by-one cases:
assertThat(HttpStatus.valueOf(99).isInformational()).isFalse();
timeline.author: trustin

timeline.bodyText:
Could also add the following to ensure off-by-one cases:
assertThat(HttpStatus.valueOf(199).isSuccess()).isFalse();
